code: import React from'react';import{TrendingUp,TrendingDown,Minus}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TrendingTopics=_ref=>{let{topics}=_ref;const getTrendIcon=trend=>{switch(trend){case'up':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TrendingUp,{className:"h-4 w-4 text-green-400"});case'down':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TrendingDown,{className:"h-4 w-4 text-red-400"});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Minus,{className:"h-4 w-4 text-gray-400"});}};const getTrendColor=trend=>{switch(trend){case'up':return'text-green-400';case'down':return'text-red-400';default:return'text-gray-400';}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"glass-effect rounded-2xl p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-white mb-6 flex items-center",children:"\uD83D\uDD0D TRENDING TOPICS (Last 7 Days)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"space-y-4",children:topics.map((topic,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-white/5 rounded-xl p-4 border border-white/10 hover:bg-white/10 transition-colors duration-200",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center space-x-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-primary-400",children:["#",topic.hashtag]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center space-x-1",children:[getTrendIcon(topic.trend),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-sm font-medium ".concat(getTrendColor(topic.trend)),children:[topic.growth>0?'+':'',topic.growth,"%"]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-white font-semibold",children:[topic.posts.toLocaleString()," posts"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-white/60 text-sm",children:topic.trend==='up'?'Growing':topic.trend==='down'?'Declining':'Stable'})]})]})},index))})]});};export default TrendingTopics;
